title: Only Human: Part One - Aftermath
description: Seattle 2082. A limited nuclear attack leaves the United States reeling towards a new dark age. Ian Hunterâ€™s first-ever squadron of genetically and tech-enhanced super soldiers prevented further destruction and Ian became a war hero. Now, after the war, he is forgotten, unemployed, and struggling to keep his marriage afloat. Then he gets a call...
author: Wesley Gray
